entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Election survey 2003
entry.dcterms:creator: Fábián, Zoltán
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F97: TÁRKI Election survey 2003. data sheet. Version: 2011-03-24
entry.dcterms:creator: Angelusz, Róbert
entry.dcterms:description: This study was focused on the political structure, socio-cultural stratification, and the digital inequlities that emerged after the diffusion of new digital technologies and their interactions. There were more research agencies involved in the field work of the survey. The methodology and research design were harmonised. This data file contains that part which was conducted by TÁRKI Inc. (n=1016).
